DOC.criteria: adult patient > =18 year age ; recipient primary kidney transplant . positive HIV1 , human Tcell leukemia/lymphoma virus1 ( HTLV1 ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ; positive hepatitis C virus , moderate severe liver disease ; active malignancy history malignancy , exclude skin cancer ( basal squamous cell ) adequately treat ; need maintenance corticosteroid another condition .
